name: PapotageVR
description:
Play as a someone who logs into a brand new VR Social platform for the first time.

This game was made during the Bourse Jeux Vidéo Game Jam 2022.

Play on Windows with mouse & keyboard. Despite the name, this is not a VR game :-) WebGL version in development.

Texts are in French only for now.

Credits

Level design & chara modelling : Ryan Marton & Baptiste Bel

Game & narrative design, writing : Florian Bernard & Elizabeth Maler

Programming : Matthieu Golsenne

Additional credits

Music composed by Seb Mason

UI SFX & Cursors : Kenney

Crowd SFX : FreqMan
